meaningMnemonic: <radical>Rain</radical> causes a <radical>landslide</radical> that causes an <kanji>earthquake</kanji>!!! The earth doesn't just slide, it <kanji>shake</kanji>s and <kanji>quake</kanji>s.
readingMnemonic: The <kanji>earthquake</kanji> shakes you so violently that you fall over, banging your <reading>shin</reading> (しん) on the coffee table. The edge of the coffee table is very sharp, so it cuts into your shin pretty badly.
